fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Convert somebody into an Everfrost locust
-Roleblock somebody, inflicting cold snap

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You bypass conversion immunity
-You may multitask
-At the begging of day one, the town will be notified that “The eternal winter is coming!”

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!
